alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 3:49PM MST until August 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 344 PM MST, Over 2.5 inches of rain have fallen in the local drainages and upstream. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the area, particularly within Tappan Wash and Cedar Wash. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... washes near Cameron, Tappan Wash, and Cedar Wash. This includes the following highways... State Route 64 between mile markers 294 and 295. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Cedar Wash, Needmore Wash, Tappan Wash, Little Colorado River, Lava Wash, Burro Canyon Wash and Campbell Francis Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
